entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Arviat

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light early this morning. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 18.
